attributes.action: Abolished The Proceeds of Crime Act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This act is just another method to tax criminals. No money never goes back to the community. They say its split 3 ways, but at the end the home office owns all 3 departments.

This money should go to victims, help homeless people and make the community better. Not by enforcing more big brother antics.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
